divs: Sighting Detailson alate summer night in early september 2006,while outside smoking a cigarette on my front porch,i am admiring the nice weather and gazing at the night sky,i notice out of the corner of my eye a very large,bright light approaching from the northwest.i begin to watch as it comes closer towards where i am standing.this object seemed to have come from at least 5 miles or more away and from the vicinity of the delawaer river scenic area, this area is very rural and at the lower reaches of the catskill and shawangunk mountains.it was a mostly clear night,very few clouds and plenty of stars out.as this came closer i realized that this was not any star or airplane,it was to bright,with no apparent blinking lights of a conventional aircraft!i thought to myself here we go again,you see,me and 4 friends witnessed the infamous boomerang craft while camping in a secluded area of dutchess county n.y in the mid 1980s,but thats a whole different sighting altogether!!anyway,this object is,by now maybe a half a mile away and is brighter than any thing in the sky.im fixed on it with my eyes and contemplating running inside and grabbing my video camera,but i decide to just stay and watch this thing.its then that irealize it is no longermoving but is completely stationary.i watched this for at least a minute or more when it suddenly flashed really bright and shot across to the east and back to approx.where it was when it flashed!!it looked like the same thing as waving a lit cigarette,back and forth in a dark room,thats the only comparison that even comes close to what i seen this object do.by now i am totally mesmerized by what i am seeing and caught up in the moment.i watched this as it moved across the night sky in a more northernly direction from wich it came.the whole episode lasted 2or3minutes.i only told my wife and closest friend of this at the time.months later while talking with a neighbor about this,his 27 year old son interrupted me and said almost word for word everything i saw that night.it was nice to know i wasnt the only one to witness this event and my eyes werent decieving me that late summer night!!!
